dc_description_s: 1 map; (In Abelin (Johann Philipp). Newe welt und Americanische historien. Durch Johann Ludwig Gottfriedt (pseud.) fol. Franckfurt, 1631. p. 1); Insets: Groenlan and text "Septentrionalisimas America párles, Groenlandiam puta, Islandiam et adjacentes quod Americæ comode comprehendi non potuerit, peculiare hac tabella. Spectatoriby exhibendas duximus."; Decorated with ships and fish. Scale approximately 1:50,010,000. At Equator (W 139°55ʹ00ʺ--W 20°12ʹ00ʺ/N 71°39ʹ00ʺ--S 70°35ʹ00ʺ).
